actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the application of the credit for producing fuels from a nonconventional source to steam produced from agricultural byproducts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore the application of the credit for producing fuel from a nonconventional source to steam produced from solid agricultural byproducts (including sugar cane residues but not including timber byproducts).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the application of the credit for producing fuels from a nonconventional source to steam produced from agricultural byproducts.
